scripts.dev: echo Starting frontend... && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.backend: echo Starting backend... && cd backend && npm start
scripts.kill: powershell -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force" && echo All Node processes killed
scripts.fresh: npm run kill && timeout /t 2 /nobreak && echo Starting fresh... && npm run backend
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
